name: Capsule Savior
description:
A very strange platform adventure.
Moving around the screen, take all the capsules and avoid viruses, slimes and cannonballs. If you survive until the end, you're going to be immunized. Uncommon?

< Controls >

  1. Arrow keys: Moves the character. At levels where there is lever, you must press the up arrow key to activate it.
  2. Shift: Jump.
